text: Piper lucigaudens is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Piper lucigaudens. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Panama lucigaudens Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Piper lucigaudens
